page.title: 17FARMING IN NESTON:2
page.content: {Overdale Farm}is{arable}and has{160 {acres.}There are 17 fields. The{main {products}are wheat, potatoes and vegetables. The fields are fertilised with manure and chemical fertilisers. {Machines}that are useful are tractors, combines and potato planters and seeders. {Sales}are local. The wheat goes for poultry feeding and occasionally is used for biscuit making. It depends on the weather, which affects the wheatgerm. The potatoes and vegetables are also sold in local markets. { Problems}on this farm are caused by vandals and trespassers. On the day we contacted the farmer two new gates had been lifted off their hinges. The crops are quite often trampled and the potatoes are pulled up.
